Projects.Name: ESPIOT
Projects.Description: IOT backend. Devices and Device actions are used to control IOT devices like the ESP8266 or Arduino.

Projects.Name: File Service
Projects.Description: File microservice that powers Codenesium. Files are uploaded and placed in buckets. Functionally this looks like S3 on AWS.

Projects.Name: Nebula
Projects.Description:
Deployment system that powers Codenesium. Similar to Octopus Deploy. Tasks are assigned to links and linked together to form a chain.
	The tasks are then executed and the responses logged.

Projects.Name: Pet Shipping
Projects.Description: CRM that could power a business that ships pets.

Projects.Name: Pet Store
Projects.Description: CRM that could be used by a pet store.

Projects.Name: Studio Resource Manager
Projects.Description: A CRM to manage a dance, music or yoga studio.

Projects.Name: Studio Resource Manager Multi-Tenant
Projects.Description: A multi-tenant CRM to manage dance, music, yoga studio.

Projects.Name: Ticketing CRM
Projects.Description: A CRM for a ticket company.
